title: [Client] "Logging onto chat service"
body: Since yesterday my friends list/chat won't connect. I have a perpetual "Logging onto chat service" message. I've found that playing a match or spectating a match will sometimes fix it after i return to the client, but I remain disconnected for the duration of the match.

It's an old issue, and if any of you bothered to Google it you'd find plenty of threads on it. The solution that worked for me was this: 
Go into your computers Date & Time settings

Change the date to lets say... one day ahead, and then launch league

Once you've logged into league it should be fixed and you can change the date back to what it originally was.

Logged in to upvote and say that this method worked, sort of:

1. Changed date from 05-08-15 to 05-09-15 (1 day ahead)
2. Logged into LoL = Chat still not working
3. Change date back to 05-08-15
4. LoL crashed
5. Logged into LoL = Chat working now


Gotta say, **THANKS!**

Note: This was around 10:43 PM EST (In the off change that this didn't work and Riot magically fixed it at that time after I've tried logging in several times prior).

For people that still can't get chat to work do the following
1) close league.
2)change the date by month or increase the day by atleast 15-20 ( for me today was 5/8/2015, i changed it to 5/26/2015), then apply.
3)Run league, and log in, note : you should get a message saying some about security certificate(if you get this you are in the right track), keep clicking yes to everything(happens throughout the process,)
4) close league
5) fix time/date
6) run league, it should work, if it doesnt try again.

SOLUTION THAT WORKED FOR MY FRIEND (After he spent hours searching through here):

If you're running windows. Don't know how to do this on a mac. 

1) Hit windows key + R
2) Type in "cmd" and hit enter
3) Type in "ipconfig /flushdns" and restart 

You're welcome :)
